title: Support SVG 2 paint-order property
body: The SVG 2 paint-order property allows authors to control the order in which stroke, markers, and fill are painted for each shape, or for text.  This can be used to create outlines that do not obscure fine details of shapes or text. It can also be used to create more subtle line markers that do not obscure the line itself.
